characterDescription.skinTone: Light beige skin with neutral undertones, subtle pinkish cheeks, and slightly darker pigmentation around the eyes.
characterDescription.eyeColor: Bright sky blue with a darker blue limbal ring and very fine light grey speckling, slightly hooded eyelids.
characterDescription.eyeShape: Almond-shaped eyes, slightly upturned at the outer corners, fairly wide-set in relation to her nose width.
characterDescription.hairColor: Medium warm brown with natural subtle auburn highlights that are more noticeable in sunlight. Darker roots are visible.
characterDescription.hairTexture: Slightly wavy with natural volume and a tendency to frizz, medium thickness strands.
characterDescription.hairStyle: Varies in the photos. Can be long, past the shoulders, worn loose with a slight wave. In another photo, styled in two high pigtail buns secured with light pink scrunchies.
characterDescription.faceShape: Oval face with a broad forehead, soft jawline, and developing cheekbones, but retains some roundness in her cheeks. The overall face structure is starting to elongate.
characterDescription.nose: Small nose with a slightly rounded tip and a very subtly concave bridge, nostrils are small and delicately shaped.
characterDescription.lips: Medium-sized lips with a slightly fuller bottom lip, natural pink color with a subtle mauve undertone. The cupid's bow is well-defined.
characterDescription.smile: Wide, enthusiastic smile revealing the upper teeth, which show a noticeable gap between the front two incisors. The smile accentuates slight nasolabial folds.
characterDescription.eyebrows: Medium-thick eyebrows with a natural arch, slightly darker than her hair color, well-groomed and defined.
characterDescription.ears: Ears are mostly hidden but appear to be medium-sized and close to the head.
characterDescription.cheeks: Full cheeks that retain some baby fat, exhibiting a subtle pink flush, especially when smiling.
characterDescription.chin: Rounded, soft chin, proportionate to her face size.
characterDescription.facialProportions: Eyes are relatively large and prominent in relation to her face size. The lower half of the face is developing and starting to balance with the forehead area.
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: Noticeable gap between her upper front teeth. Subtle dark circles under her eyes. Slight asymmetry in the cheeks, more fullness on the left side. Her upper lip has a slight philtrum definition.
characterDescription.overallImpression: Sweet, cheerful, and energetic appearance. She has a youthful and playful look. The gap in her teeth adds to her endearing charm.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This girl is around 7-8 years old with light beige skin featuring neutral undertones and a hint of pink on her cheeks. Her bright sky blue, almond-shaped eyes, slightly upturned at the corners, are wide-set and framed by medium-thick, arched eyebrows slightly darker than her warm brown hair. Her slightly wavy, medium-thick hair features subtle auburn highlights, especially visible in sunlight, and has darker roots. She has a small nose with a gently rounded tip and a wide, enthusiastic smile, defined by medium-sized, pink lips revealing a noticeable gap between her upper front teeth, contributing to her sweet and cheerful expression.
